00028 #ifndef __GLESDepthBuffer_H__
00029 #define __GLESDepthBuffer_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreGLESPrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreGLESHardwarePixelBuffer.h"
00033 #include "OgreGLESRenderSystem.h"
00034 #include "OgreDepthBuffer.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre 
00037 {
00049     class GLESDepthBuffer : public DepthBuffer
00050     {
00051     public:
00052         GLESDepthBuffer( uint16 poolId, GLESRenderSystem *renderSystem, GLESContext *creatorContext,
00053                         GLESRenderBuffer *depth, GLESRenderBuffer *stencil,
00054                         uint32 width, uint32 height, uint32 fsaa, uint32 multiSampleQuality,
00055                         bool isManual );
00056         ~GLESDepthBuffer();
00057 
00059         virtual bool isCompatible( RenderTarget *renderTarget ) const;
00060 
00061         GLESContext* getGLContext() const { return mCreatorContext; }
00062         GLESRenderBuffer* getDepthBuffer() const  { return mDepthBuffer; }
00063         GLESRenderBuffer* getStencilBuffer() const { return mStencilBuffer; }
00064 
00065     protected:
00066         uint32                      mMultiSampleQuality;
00067         GLESContext                 *mCreatorContext;
00068         GLESRenderBuffer            *mDepthBuffer;
00069         GLESRenderBuffer            *mStencilBuffer;

00071     };
